Judul: Mythological Consciousness Transformation in Terms of the Modern Society
Abstrak: This  article  investigates  the  certain  concepts  of  mythological  consciousness  as an  important  component  of  the  national  world  view  in  terms  of  development  and  operation  of mythologems  in  the  general  cultural  and specific  national  context  of  the  English  language  world view
Kata Kunci: Mythologem;     concept;     lower     devildom;     representation;     mythological  consciousness; language world view; national consciousness; language, thinking.
